contents:
No!
朕 youth time learned: Hanyu Pinyin, NMSLese, Zhi?nese, Korean Fish, LaRounese, Seed woop seed delay?
And 全 world is speaking Qingfenglish, Xibaozinese more and more brew laugh. 朕 do not need a translate Jiucai. Thank you!
Disagreed 的 please raise hand: no have, no have, no have!
No have, pass!
